column5: Beautiful townhouse nestled among towering live oaks. 2 bedrooms, each with a queen size bed, 2 baths, and a modern sofa that unfolds into a double-bed. Sleeps six comfortably. Fully-equipped kitchen; washer/dryer. Awesome roof-top deck with views of the Capitol. This is a non-smoking property, indoors and out. This property is not a party house. Guests in excess of six are not permitted without the express permission of the hosts.
column8: Walkable, downtown oasis w/ a view!
